title: After diplomatic blitz on Ukraine and Gaza, Trump moves to passenger seat
summary: Trump has largely withdrawn from diplomacy in recent weeks.

title: Trump used golden share to block US Steel’s production halt plan: WSJ
summary: US Steel notified workers in Granite City two weeks ago that plant operations would cease in November.

title: New York eyes record Climate Week despite Trump attacks on green agenda
summary: When Climate Week kicks off on Sunday in New York City, it will mark the event’s biggest year yet – with organizers reporting a record number of companies participating and more events than ever to attend.

title: Explainer-Who will speak at the UN and what is on the agenda?
summary: UNITED NATIONS - World leaders gather in New York every September for several days of speeches at the annual United Nations General Assembly, which on Tuesday begins its 80th session.

title: Israel’s Gaza City demolitions fan fears of permanent removal of Palestinians
summary: In recent weeks, up to a dozen homes have been destroyed daily in Zeitoun, Tuffah and Shejaia.
